overall.description: Go to Main Setup (or press M). Then, to continue a game you've already started, click Load from File. Otherwise, browse the Pre-Built Scenarios. Or, to start from scratch, go to Overall Settings and describe your idea, along with a title. Next, add a few initial items or characters. More can be set up as the game goes along. An AI may also be helpful to fill in lists (similar to those found in tabletop game manuals) or add factual details.
overall.title: Generic Adventure
